name: Normal Verse
description:
Use WASD to Move and Eat!!! In Normal Verse, you can  be a programmer, taking a dip in the sea of codes and making bugs, or be a technical artist, making the best Grass Material with NormalMap from NormalUniverse,  absorbing energy from Normal Bagel!

I made this game with my friend NINI, we are both technical artist so we thought about making sth about our job, as u can see there are codes, bug, normal map and material editor in our game. As for gameplay, "GROWTH" reminds us of EATING and becoming BIGGER (or something), like Pacman and Retro Snake, so we mixed them together :-) The game is very short and just ends with "thank you" cuz we didn't have much time to finish it ;-(  Maybe we will finish it in the future :o)
